answers.answer: Sounds like diabetes.  Probably your doc will order a blood sugar test.Best wishes.
DOES sound like diabetes... With the urination symptoms and lower back pain, I'd also get your kidney function tested.Good luck!
Sounds like adrenal fatigue or maybe even addisons. Have it looked into.

You should also be checked for Sjogren's syndrome. The most common symptoms are dry eyes, dry mouth, vaginal dryness, and fatigue. It is an autoimmune disease and can also cause neuropathy that will manifest a variety of symptoms.

question: So I was wondering what might be wrong... I stay thirsty.. I stay tired all the time.. I feel really drained of all my energy.. I get light headed out of nowhere.. bad headaches... frequent urination...  my lower back on the right side has recently started hurting so bad that it's making me feel sick to my stomach... I have yeast infection like symptoms... I haven't had a period in 2 months... I am going to see my doctor soon but I wanna know what to expect so please someone else.. thanks
title: I really don't know what's going on with me...
